name: Gum Wars *Broken* for now
description:
I bit off more than I could chew parts of it work other parts I haven't tested yet.

Pop Theme: if you die you pop. If you have enough controllers to make coop work you can get revived if someone pickups all your popped gum.

GOAL: Get the highest kills per second you can get. KPS is in the top right corner

If something goes wrong just close and reopen the game.

I had fun programming some new systems especially split screen but they all need more work.

Thanks for reading and for playing!

Modeling: Jervey (I made the gum men and enemies :P)

Programming : Steve
